what: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation.
title: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation.
text: goal randMeasures easily compute several measures human random sequence generation.

title: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation.
text: can install development version randMeasures GitHub :

title: RNG — RNG
text: s Sequence vector. Optional. Vector alternatives (e.g. 1:6 mental dice task).

title: Recurrent Quantification Analyses — RQA
text: sequence sequence analyse lmin minimum diagonal length DET vmin minimum vertical length LAM

Get all measures — all_measures
code: all_measures(s, a = NULL, drop.r = NULL, maxOrder = 7)

title: Get all measures — all_measures
text: s Sequence vector. Optional. Vector alternatives (e.g. 1:6 mental dice task). drop.r Optional. Whether drop repetitions calculating measures

title: Get all measures — all_measures
code: all_measures(sample(1:5, 100, T)) #> Calculating Adj, TPs and distances #>   redundancy repetitions adjacency turning_points distances   coupon #> 1  0.0135245   0.1818182 0.3535354       0.622449   1.59596 9.666667 #>   repetition_gap_med repetition_gap_mean       RNG      RNG2 NSQ cluster_ratio #> 1                  3            4.842105 0.5135636 0.4829127   0      5.666667 #>   phase_length_1 phase_length_2 phase_length_3 phase_length_4 phase_length_5 #> 1      0.5833333      0.2833333      0.1166667              0              0 #>   fod_m5     fod_m4    fod_m3    fod_m2    fod_m1     fod_0    fod_p1    fod_p2 #> 1      0 0.02020202 0.1010101 0.1212121 0.1717172 0.1818182 0.1818182 0.1010101 #>       fod_p3     fod_p4 fod_p5     Phi_2    Phi_3      Phi_4     Phi_5 #> 1 0.07070707 0.05050505      0 -1.593029 2.789926 -0.2317344 -1.716976 #>       Phi_6      Phi_7 #> 1 0.2456266 -0.8192461

what: randMeasures: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation. — randMeasures-package
title: randMeasures: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation. — randMeasures-package
text: package provides series measures employed random generation literature evaluate people's sequences.

title: randMeasures: Tools for analysis of human random sequence generation. — randMeasures-package
Redundancy — redundancy
text: s Sequence vector. Optional. Vector alternatives (e.g. 1:6 mental dice task).

title: Repetition Gap — repetition_gap
text: s Sequence vector. Optional. Vector alternatives (e.g. 1:6 mental dice task). measure String. Either 'median', 'mode' 'mean'.

title: Repetition Gap — repetition_gap
text: Gap measure (either mode, median mean, specified measure).

title: Repetition Gap — repetition_gap
code: v <- sample(1:100, 100, T) repetition_gap(v, measure = "mean") #> [1] 30.28947 repetition_gap(v, measure = "median") #> [1] 24.5 repetition_gap(v, measure = "mode") #> [1] 7

title: Repetitions — repetitions
text: s Sequence vector. full Optional. Boolean.

title: Repetitions — repetitions
text: full returns vector length = length(s) whether ith item repetition last. Otherwise returns mean repetition rate.

title: Repetitions — repetitions
code: s <- sample(1:10, 100, T) repetitions(s) #> [1] 0.09090909 repetitions(s, full=T) #>   [1]    NA FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE #>  [13] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [25] FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [37] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE #>  [49] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [61] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [73] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [85] FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE #>  [97]  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE
